name: Data Terms of Use
tagline: social contracts for heterogeneous data in decentralised environments
body:
### Introduction
This work focuses on allowing people to express and control how people can express how personal information, that is, information created by them, about them, or directed toward them, should be handled.  Note that this is not a framework for guaranteeing the enforcement of such preferences; but for supporting the expression of such preferences and allowing people to easily comply with them if they choose (for politeness), or to be able to easily understand the ways that their uses of such information violates actorsâ€™ intents.
